metadata.title: CVE-2022-41318 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer over-read was discovered in libntlmauth in Squid 2.5 through 5.6.Due to incorrect integer-overflow protection, the SSPI and SMBauthentication helpers are vulnerable to reading unintended memorylocations. In some configurations, cleartext credentials from theselocations are sent to a client. This is fixed in 5.7.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
